summary: Project aims to publish/deploy the website live to a permanent domain; deployment currently failing due to an invalid domain name format.
architectural_notes: Deployment requires a domain name between 5 and 50 characters using only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
known_issues: Live deployment unsuccessful due to domain validation error (invalid domain name characters/format).

existing_features.title: Publish the current Valentine’s wish/Valentine’s Surprise project as a permanent (non-expiring) live site on the Internet Computer using the platform-provided default domain (no custom domain configuration).
If the deployment workflow requires specifying a domain/slug, generate and use a random valid slug that is 5–50 characters and contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish/deploy the website live to a permanent domain
Resolve domain name validation issue by selecting/setting a valid domain (5–50 chars; letters/numbers/hyphens) for deployment

projectName: Deploy Valentine’s wish site to a permanent Internet Computer live URL
